price: Na ingawa atatoa chungu ya udhuru.
footnotes: Na ijapo kuwa atajitolea chungu nzima ya udhuru na akazieneza, hawezi kabisa kuepukana na hoja hizo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
